person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Palestine Liberation Organisation ( PLO ) negotiators said the last two weeks of talks with Israel on implementing the long-delayed handover of most of Hebron to PLO rule had been " meaningless " , necessitating an Arafat-Netanyahu meeting .

Let's think step by step.

1. The Palestine Liberation Organisation (PLO) - An organization
2. PLO negotiators - A group of people representing the PLO in negotiations
3. Israel - A country
4. Netanyahu - Benjamin Netanyahu, the Prime Minister of Israel at the time of the negotiations.
5. Arafat - Yasser Arafat, the former President of the PLO and the Palestinian Authority.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Palestine Liberation Organisation ( PLO ) negotiators said the last two weeks of talks with Israel on implementing the long-delayed handover of most of Hebron to PLO rule had been " meaningless " , necessitating an Arafat-Netanyahu meeting .

Let's think step by step.

1. Palestine Liberation Organisation (PLO) - An organization, but it also functions as a political entity representing the Palestinians.
2. Hebron - A location, specifically a city in the West Bank.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.
1. Hebron - A city in the West Bank.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Palestine Liberation Organisation ( PLO ) negotiators said the last two weeks of talks with Israel on implementing the long-delayed handover of most of Hebron to PLO rule had been " meaningless " , necessitating an Arafat-Netanyahu meeting .

Let's think step by step.

1. Palestine Liberation Organisation (PLO) - This is an organization mentioned by name in the paragraph.
2. PLO negotiators - These are individuals representing the PLO in the negotiations.
3. Israel - This is not explicitly stated as an organization in the paragraph, but it is implied as the other party in the negotiations with the PLO.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
